items.title: Product Expertise
items.description: Our team has over 20 years of experience helping DAX companies innovate and launch new products and business lines. We will guide your company through all the steps of the product development cycle from the idea generation, concept development, feasibility study, customer validation and testing, all the way to market launch.

items.title: Product Development
items.description: Finding a market fit is always a challenge. The earlier it is found the higher will be the chances of your company being successful. We use lean methodology in order to build the right products with the least amount of time and effort spent. We test for market fit early and often using data-driven product development. Iterating and adjusting quickly will allow you to learn about your customer sooner rather than later, thus ensuring a great start in the long product journey.

data.title: The morning alarm clock
data.description: Used by K-12 students as their daily alarm clock, students start the day more focused and alert. Using Cleu leads to higher grit, perseverance, and class attendance. Cleu is available on the AppStore and our solutions team for district-wide pilots.

data.title: Fix most of the pressing issues and bugs
paragraphs: Cleu founder, Uzair had fallen into the common trap of outsourcing the app development of his idea to a low-cost agency, in order to “fit” it into his limited budget.
The result was a mobile app that was a slow, unresponsive and bug prone app. He contacted Softup with the hope to fix most of the pressing issues and bugs.

data.title: Title
paragraphs: Cleu founder, Uzair had fallen into the common trap of outsourcing the app development of his idea to a low-cost agency, in order to “fit” it into his limited budget.
The result was a mobile app that was a slow, unresponsive and bug prone app. He contacted Softup with the hope to fix most of the pressing issues and bugs.

data.title: Fixed issues
paragraphs: One of our senior consultants quickly got to work and delivered within 48 hours a list of issues some known but most of them unknown, that needed to be handled right away for the app to be presentable in front of potential customers and investors.
All the issues were fixed in the next two weeks and shortly after Cleu was able to get a new batch of Beta users to the platform.

The founder would decide to work exclusively with Softup going forward in order to maintain the high performance and reliability of the mobile app. He scaled his development team at Softup with 3 developers working full time in order to make Cleu the most promising product in its niche.
